name: rtm
description: Content-driven documentation site built with Next.js and MDX

scripts.postbuild: npx pagefind --site out --output-path out/pagefind && rm -rf public/pagefind && cp -r out/pagefind public/pagefind
scripts.oled:venv: cd tools/oledvec/engine-python && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.oled:process: cd tools/oledvec/engine-python && source venv/bin/activate && python -m oledvec process ${DEVICE:-analog-rytm-mkii}
scripts.oled:review: cd tools/oledvec/engine-python && source venv/bin/activate && python -m oledvec server --device ${DEVICE:-analog-rytm-mkii}
